I'm Naheem Hines, proud supporter of the Muscular Dystrophy Association. My mom has muscular dystrophy, and the MDA helps her and kids like my buddy Ethan. My name is Ethan, and I'm 12 years old. Great to have you along for the ride. Thanks a lot for stopping by. Glad to have this young lady on. Her name is Caroline Sunshine, who I think we probably have appeared on a television show or two together, but we've never met. Caroline, how are you? Good to see you.

I am great, thank you. Like I said, better than Joe Biden outside the hours of 7 and 4 p.m. Great to be on your show. Well, I agree with you that you are better than Joe Biden, and you are great. How does something like that happen? Do they notice how excellent you are on these hits and how you communicate very well? How does that even come to fruition?

I'd love to take that much credit. I've been an enthusiastic supporter of President Trump for a long time. I actually had the honor of serving in his White House. I was an intern in his White House press office, then had the honor of serving in his press office. And they always kind of say all roads can lead back to President Trump. And I'm so grateful to be on this team. I just think the stakes couldn't be higher for this country. And I've always thought ever since President Trump came down that escalator in 2015, that he was just a singular force in American politics. And it's truly my honor to get to play some role in

in this movement that he leads so, so beautifully. I don't want to go to memory lane too much, but were you an intern in 2017? I was, yes. So I think we met at the White House because I was one of five shows that was invited there. And my daughter, Sam, is my executive producer. We went to the White House and interviewed the president about the tax cuts that were coming up. We felt very, very honored. I know that I've seen you somewhere. I'll bet you might have been there when we were there.

You are taking me back. Oh, my gosh. I have such fond memories of our time in the White House. You know, just everything that President Trump was able to accomplish and the great American patriot. Just such a – what an honor. What an honor. That is so great. You're taking me down memory lane. Well, good. I'm glad that we went there for a second. Now let's talk about the future.

I think Trump was going to do great anyway. I think he was going to win by a landslide anyway. and his knowledge of the issues. And the debate was just simply another point to highlight that contrast. But we've been waiting big long before the debate to end all debates. from the president when he said, holy crap, you saw what just happened last night. I knocked it out of the park. He's gone. Instead of this, let's do this. Absolutely. Let's keep going. Let's keep the Trump train going. You know, you just saw President Trump last night in Miami. I thought that was a particularly excellent rally. Well, President Trump said he would debate him anytime, anyplace, anywhere, and he certainly made good on that promise. I guess also you saw President Trump invite him to, maybe if Joe doesn't want to debate, he'll join him in a round of golf. That's really a credit to President Trump and his message. He's on the right side of the issues that are most important to the American people.
